user_text: 넌 어떤 걸 할 수 있어?
종합적인 지표들을 조회해서, 이 선수를 평가해줘

sql: WITH team_games AS (SELECT season_id, team_abbreviation_home AS team_abbreviation, pts_home AS pts_for, pts_away AS pts_against FROM game UNION ALL SELECT season_id, team_abbreviation_away AS team_abbreviation, pts_away AS pts_for, pts_home AS pts_against FROM game) SELECT team_abbreviation, AVG(pts_for - pts_against) AS avg_point_diff FROM team_games WHERE season_id = '22022' GROUP BY team_abbreviation ORDER BY avg_point_diff DESC LIMIT 10

user_text: 스테픈 커리의 월별 출전시간/평균득점/슛 성공률 트렌드를 분석하고, 정규시즌과 플레이오프 간의 차이가 있는 지도 분석해줘
sql: WITH team_games AS (SELECT game_date, team_id_home AS team_id, team_abbreviation_home AS team_abbreviation FROM game UNION ALL SELECT game_date, team_id_away AS team_id, team_abbreviation_away AS team_abbreviation FROM game), ordered AS (SELECT team_id, team_abbreviation, DATE(game_date) AS game_date, LAG(DATE(game_date)) OVER (PARTITION BY team_id ORDER BY DATE(game_date)) AS prev_date FROM team_games) SELECT team_abbreviation, COUNT(*) AS back_to_back_games FROM ordered WHERE NOT prev_date IS NULL AND JULIANDAY(game_date) - JULIANDAY(prev_date) = 1 GROUP BY team_abbreviation ORDER BY back_to_back_games DESC LIMIT 10

user_text: 스테픈 커리의 월별 출전시간/평균득점/슛 성공률 트렌드를 분석하고, 정규시즌과 플레이오프 간의 차이가 있는 지도 분석해줘
응 한글이름을 모르나? Stephen Curry 이야
Stephen Curry의 연도/월별 출전시간/평균득점/슛 성공률 트렌드를 분석하고, 정규시즌과 플레이오프 간의 차이가 있는 지도 분석해줘

sql: SELECT display_first_last, position, height, weight, country, school, season_exp, from_year, to_year, team_name, team_abbreviation FROM common_player_info WHERE display_first_last LIKE '%Stephen Curry%' LIMIT 200

user_text: 최근 리그에서 승률 상위 5개 팀 알려줘
sql: WITH team_games AS (SELECT season_id, team_abbreviation_home AS team_abbreviation, team_name_home AS team_name, wl_home AS wl FROM game WHERE season_id = '22022' AND season_type = 'Regular Season' UNION ALL SELECT season_id, team_abbreviation_away AS team_abbreviation, team_name_away AS team_name, wl_away AS wl FROM game WHERE season_id = '22022' AND season_type = 'Regular Season') SELECT team_name, team_abbreviation, '2022-23' AS season_year, SUM(CASE WHEN wl = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS w, SUM(CASE WHEN wl = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS l, ROUND(1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN wl = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 3) AS pct FROM team_games GROUP BY team_abbreviation, team_name ORDER BY pct DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT game_id, game_date, team_abbreviation_home, team_abbreviation_away, pts_home, pts_away, wl_home, wl_away FROM game WHERE (team_abbreviation_home = 'GSW' AND team_abbreviation_away = 'LAL') OR (team_abbreviation_home = 'LAL' AND team_abbreviation_away = 'GSW') AND season_id = '22022' ORDER BY game_date DESC LIMIT 200

user_text: 2023-24 시즌 팀 득점 상위 10개팀의 22-23 시즌의 월별 승률, 평균득점, 슛성공률 트렌드를 분석해줘
sql: WITH team_games AS (SELECT season_id, team_abbreviation_home AS team_abbreviation, team_name_home AS team_name, pts_home AS pts FROM game WHERE season_id = '22022' AND season_type = 'Regular Season' UNION ALL SELECT season_id, team_abbreviation_away AS team_abbreviation, team_name_away AS team_name, pts_away AS pts FROM game WHERE season_id = '22022' AND season_type = 'Regular Season') SELECT team_name, team_abbreviation, '2022-23' AS season_year, AVG(pts) AS pts_pg FROM team_games GROUP BY team_abbreviation, team_name ORDER BY pts_pg DESC LIMIT 10

user_text: 최근 리그에서 승률 상위 5개 팀 알려줘
sql: WITH team_games AS (SELECT season_id, team_abbreviation_home AS team_abbreviation, team_name_home AS team_name, wl_home AS wl FROM game WHERE season_id = '22022' AND season_type = 'Regular Season' UNION ALL SELECT season_id, team_abbreviation_away AS team_abbreviation, team_name_away AS team_name, wl_away AS wl FROM game WHERE season_id = '22022' AND season_type = 'Regular Season') SELECT team_name, team_abbreviation, '2022-23' AS season_year, SUM(CASE WHEN wl = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS w, SUM(CASE WHEN wl = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS l, ROUND(1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN wl = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 3) AS pct FROM team_games GROUP BY team_abbreviation, team_name ORDER BY pct DESC LIMIT 5

WITH team_games AS (SELECT team_abbreviation_home AS team_abbreviation, fgm_home AS fgm, fg3m_home AS fg3m, fga_home AS fga FROM game UNION ALL SELECT team_abbreviation_away AS team_abbreviation, fgm_away AS fgm, fg3m_away AS fg3m, fga_away AS fga FROM game) SELECT team_abbreviation, AVG((fgm + 0.5 * fg3m) / fga) AS efg_pct FROM team_games WHERE fga > 0 GROUP BY team_abbreviation ORDER BY efg_pct DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT gi.game_date, g.team_abbreviation_home, g.team_abbreviation_away, gi.attendance FROM game_info AS gi JOIN game AS g ON g.game_id = gi.game_id ORDER BY gi.attendance DESC LIMIT 10
